java/liquibase/change/DropTableChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.DropTableStatement;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.Table;
00008 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00009 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00010 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00011 
00012 import java.util.Arrays;
00013 import java.util.HashSet;
00014 import java.util.Set;
00015 
00019 public class DropTableChange extends AbstractChange {
00020 
00021     private String schemaName;
00022     private String tableName;
00023     private Boolean cascadeConstraints;
00024 
00025     public DropTableChange() {
00026         super("dropTable", "Drop Table");
00027     }
00028 
00029 
00030     public String getSchemaName() {
00031         return schemaName;
00032     }
00033 
00034     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00035         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00036     }
00037 
00038     public String getTableName() {
00039         return tableName;
00040     }
00041 
00042     public void setTableName(String tableName) {
00043         this.tableName = tableName;
00044     }
00045 
00046     public Boolean isCascadeConstraints() {
00047         return cascadeConstraints;
00048     }
00049 
00050     public void setCascadeConstraints(Boolean cascadeConstraints) {
00051         this.cascadeConstraints = cascadeConstraints;
00052     }
00053 
00054     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00055         boolean constraints = false;
00056         if (isCascadeConstraints() != null) {
00057             constraints = isCascadeConstraints();
00058         }
00059         
00060         return new SqlStatement[]{
00061                 new DropTableStatement(getSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getSchemaName(), getTableName(), constraints)
00062         };
00063     }
00064 
00065     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00066         return "Table " + getTableName() + " dropped";
00067     }
00068 
00069     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00070         Element element = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement("dropTable");
00071         if (getSchemaName() != null) {
00072             element.setAttribute("schemaName", getSchemaName());
00073         }
00074 
00075         element.setAttribute("tableName", getTableName());
00076 
00077         if (isCascadeConstraints() != null) {
00078             element.setAttribute("cascadeConstraints", isCascadeConstraints().toString());
00079         }
00080 
00081         return element;
00082     }
00083 
00084     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00085         Table dbObject = new Table(getTableName());
00086 
00087         return new HashSet<DatabaseObject>(Arrays.asList(dbObject));
00088     }
00089 
00090 }
